title: Senior Citizen Savings Scheme (SCSS) Account Details

sections.heading: Who Can Open
points: An individual above 60 years of age
Retired Civilian Employees aged 55–60, investment within 1 month of receiving retirement benefits
Retired Defense Employees aged 50–60, investment within 1 month of receiving retirement benefits
Account can be opened individually or jointly with spouse only
Entire deposit in a joint account is attributed to the first holder only

sections.heading: Deposits
points: Minimum deposit: Rs. 1000 and in multiples of Rs. 1000
Maximum limit: Rs. 30 lakh across all SCSS accounts of an individual
Excess deposit will be refunded immediately with only PO Savings Account interest applicable for the excess period
Investment qualifies for Section 80C benefit under Income Tax Act, 1961

sections.heading: Interest
points: Interest is payable quarterly from the date of deposit to the quarter ending (Mar 31, Jun 30, Sep 30, Dec 31)
Unclaimed quarterly interest will not earn additional interest
Interest can be credited via auto credit or ECS; for CBS Post Offices, monthly interest can go to CBS savings account
Interest is taxable if it exceeds Rs. 50,000 in a financial year; TDS applies unless Form 15G/15H is submitted and threshold not crossed

sections.heading: Premature Closure
points: Account can be closed anytime after opening
If closed before 1 year: no interest payable; any paid interest will be recovered
If closed between 1–2 years: 1.5% of principal deducted
If closed between 2–5 years: 1% of principal deducted
Extended account can be closed after 1 year of extension without deduction

sections.heading: Account Closure on Maturity
points: Account can be closed after 5 years from opening by submitting application with passbook
In case of death, account earns PO Savings interest from date of death
If spouse is joint holder or nominee, and eligible, account may continue till maturity if no other SCSS account is held

sections.heading: Extension of Account
points: Account can be extended for 3 more years after maturity by submitting form and passbook
Extension must be done within 1 year of maturity
Extended account earns interest as per rate on date of maturity

sections.heading: Note
points: As per Senior Citizen Savings Scheme Rules 2019
